name: Tiling Towers
description:
Tiling Towers is a Tower Defense game, where you expand a predetermined path and survive waves of increasingly stronger enemies and bosses. Choose from 3 randomly generated cards every few waves to unlock new towers or increase the amount of resources you have.

With your arsenal of 8 different towers, can you protect the Crimson Crystal from destruction?

Card Select

Every few waves, choose from 3 randomly generated cards to effect the gameplay, will you choose to unlock a new tower, or gain a large sum of crystals, or increase the amount of health points you have.

Towers

With an arsenal of 8 towers to choose from, you will have plenty of options to protect the Crimson Crystal, will you use the Frost Tower to slow enemies down or use the Meteor Towers for high damage output, or a combination of both... the choice is yours.

Crystals

Use crystals to build new towers, you gain crystals for each enemy defeated.
Crystals will also occasionally spawn on tiles around the map, click on these crystals to harvest them... however for each wave that passes you gain more crystals per harvest. Do you harvest all the crystals as they spawn, or wait to harvest them at a higher wave to get more crystals.

Bosses

Bosses will spawn every ten waves in Classic Mode, bosses have a large amount of heath and if they reach the Crimson Crystal, its game over. Be sure to have optimal combinations of towers and placements to deal with bosses.

Tiles

Click on Tiles to build towers, building towers cost crystals.
